title: Boeing Earnings miss, Revenue beats In Q3
text:
Boeing Earnings miss, Revenue beats In Q3

Investing.com - Boeing (NYSE: ) reported third quarter that missed analysts' expectations on Wednesday and revenue that topped forecasts.

The firm reported earnings per share of $1.45 on revenue of $19.98B. Analysts polled by Investing.com anticipated EPS of $2.08 on revenue of $19.56B. That compared to EPS of $3.58 on revenue of $25.15B in the same period a year earlier. The company had reported EPS of $-5.82 on revenue of $15.75B in the previous quarter.

Boeing shares lost 1.78% to trade at $331.00 in pre-market trade following the report.

Boeing shares lost 1.78% to trade at $331.00 in pre-market trade following the report.

For the year, Boeing shares are up 4.5%, under-performing the which is up 20.95% year to date.

Boeing follows other major Capital Goods sector earnings this month

On Thursday, October 17, 2019, Honeywell reported third quarter EPS of $2.08 on revenue of $9.09B, compared to forecasts of EPS of $2.01 on revenue of $9.12B.

United Technologies earnings beat analyst's expectations on Tuesday, with third quarter EPS of $2.21 on revenue of $19.5B. Investing.com analysts expected EPS of $2.03 on revenue of $19.32B

description: Boeing Earnings miss, Revenue beats In Q3
